00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "pwm.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup TM_Examples TM
00038   * @{
00039   */
00040 
00041 /** @addtogroup PWM
00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 
00046 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 void Delay(u32 uLoop);
00048 
00049 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00051   * @brief  Main program.
00052   * @retval None
00053   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00054 int main(void)
00055 {
00056   PWM_Init();
00057 
00058   PWM_UpdateDuty(PWM_CH0, PWM_DUTY_50);
00059   PWM_UpdateDuty(PWM_CH1, PWM_DUTY_25);
00060   PWM_Cmd(ENABLE);
00061 
00062   Delay(5000);
00063 
00064   PWM_UpdateDuty(PWM_CH0, PWM_DUTY_0);
00065   PWM_UpdateDuty(PWM_CH1, PWM_DUTY_75);
00066 
00067   Delay(5000);
00068 
00069   PWM_Cmd(DISABLE);
00070 
00071   Delay(5000);
00072 
00073   PWM_SetFreq(PWM_FREQ_12K);
00074   PWM_UpdateDuty(PWM_CH0, PWM_FREQ_12K * 0.25);
00075   PWM_UpdateDuty(PWM_CH1, PWM_FREQ_12K * 0.75);
00076   PWM_Cmd(ENABLE);
00077 
00078   while (1);
00079 }
00080 
00081 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00082   * @brief  Dealy loop.
00083   * @param  uLoop: Delay loop count
00084   * @retval None
00085   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00086 void Delay(u32 uLoop)
00087 {
00088   vu32 i;
00089   for (i = 0; i < uLoop; i++);
00090 }
00091 
00092 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00093 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00094   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00095   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00096   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00097   * @retval None
00098   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00099 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00100 {
00101   /*
00102      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00103      Debug message can be added here.
00104      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00105   */
00106 
00107   while (1)
00108   {
00109   }
00110 }
00111 #endif
